episodes.title: SURVIVOR | SARAH EDMONDSON || Wicked Ever After for Death Not Yet
episodes.description:
Actor-turned-whistleblower Sarah Edmondson thought she had found purpose in the self-help group NXIVM—until she uncovered its disturbing truth. In this episode, we trace her journey from devoted member to the key witness in taking down the cult NXIVM and its leader, Keith Raniere.

This is a Podcaster’s Give Back collaboration. All podcasters have donated their time and research to help advocate for victims of domestic violence.

 And we are raising money to give back to non profits which are standing with survivors.

 To donate, please visit buymeacoffee.com/youshouldbehere


You are wanted.
You are loved.
And you are not in this alone.

This is a Fire Eyes Media, LLC production www.fireeyesmedia.com
Don't forget to check out the previous series of You Should Be Here:
The Homicide Tree
Or No
and coming in October: Cases That Haunt Us
